Class TextResource

    • createText

      @POST @Path("/create") @Produces("application/json") public jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response createText(@FormParam("text") String text)
      Creates a new Text object and returns it.
      Parameters:
      text - The text of the Text object.
      Returns:
      The created text object if successful.
      Since:
      1.2.0

      Parameters:
      id - the id of the text
      Returns:
      200 if successful

    • getText

      @GET @Path("/{id}") @Produces("application/json") public jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response getText(@PathParam("id") String id)
      Returns a Text object by its id.
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the Text object.
      Returns:
      A Text object.

    • getTexts

      @GET @Path("/list") @Produces("application/json") public jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response getTexts()
      Returns all Text objects.
      Returns:
      A list of Text objects.
      Since:

    • getTextByChatbot

      @GET @Path("/chatbot/{id}") @Produces("application/json") public jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response getTextByChatbot(@PathParam("id") String id)
      Returns all Text objects that are associated with a specific chatbot.
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the chatbot.
      Returns:
